name: Pong time
description:
I present to you my first game made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5 is a remake of the old Pong game! THIS IS A MULTIPLAYER GAME! Believe it or not, I actully made this game in only 1 day!  Also be careful, because the game will start once you open the application!

Player controls:

Player 1: the left and right arrow keys.

Player 2: moving the mouse left and right.

BTW I mentioned in my latest devlog that I'm exepting game requests from you guys because of my lack of ideas lately. So if you have anything, leave it in the comments below! Also tell me if I should make any updates to this game in the future!
